arts.ttl: La Liga Round Up: Atletico Madrid revive title push as Rayo Vallecano slip again
arts.sum: Saturday’s La Liga action featured another key twist in the thrilling title race as Atletico Madrid stormed to a 3-0 victory away at Valencia. Every step in the title race will be carefully managed by Diego Simeone and Co. but they have sealed a key edge this weekend.
